concepts.term: This is a very special case, but it makes the principle clear: our signal directly corresponds to the Fourier components of the object we are imaging.

evidence: This function describes the true tissue properties in space

triples.evidence: The signal of t, the thing we actually measure, is the Fourier transform of f of x and y, evaluated along the kx axis.
